document.full_text: oil turned lower on monday as a bout of profit-taking was sparked when silver reversed after a sharp rally and when there was no follow through after u.s. oil prices hit their highest since september 2008 in early trading.
document.title: oil slips as silver retreat spurs profit taking
lines_and_colors: oil turned lower on monday as a bout of profit-taking was sparked when silver reversed after a sharp rally and when there was no follow through after u.s. oil prices hit their highest since september 2008 in early trading.
